entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
